disable.title: üéÑ Merry Christmas
disable.description:
**Server administrators:** if you want to stop the countdown, use the `‚Äã%stoggle`‚Äã command to disable it.

Please consider reviewing the bot [here](%s). Thank you for using the Christmas Countdown bot for Discord, enjoy your Christmas! üôÇ

help.title: Commands
help.description:
For more information about a specific command, use `%s` or click on its name. For distinction between days and sleeps, click [here](%s).
**Quick setup:** `%sserver setup`.

invite.title: Invite
invite.description: Add the Christmas Countdown bot to your own server: [invite](%s)

reset.title: ‚úÖ Server settings reset
reset.description: This server's settings have been reset to the defaults. Use %s to re-configure.

setup.success: You can further modify your settings with [`%sserver set`](%s).

timezone.prompt:
**Which timezone do you want the bot to use?**

[Click here for a list of timezones](%s).
If you don't know, choose `UTC` now, __you can change this later__.
timezone.error: Invalid timezone. See the [docs](%s). Exited setup prompt.

enabled.prompt:
**Enable the countdown?** (`yes`/`no`)
__You can change this later__.

channel.prompt: Mention the text channel you want the countdown to use.
channel.error: Invalid channel mention. Exited setup prompt.

reset.title: ‚úÖ User settings reset
reset.description: Your settings have been reset to the defaults. Use `%s` to re-configure.

settings.sub_cmds:
The %s command has the following subcommands:

%s

enabled.title: Enabled
enabled.channel_not_set: Cannot enable countdown before channel is set

mention.title: Mention
mention.role_not_set: Cannot enable mentioning before role is set

invalid.description:
There were some issues with the provided options:
%s
**Click on the blue setting name to see the documentation.**

timezones.title: Timezones
timezones.description: Use %s to list timezones by country, where `<country>` is a country code (examples: `US`, `GB`,`DE`, `FR`, or `RU`)

list.title: Valid timezones
list.too_long: The list is too long to send! Click [here](%s) to visit the docs.

no_channel.title: ‚ùå Cannot enable countdown before channel is set

client.title: Missing permissions
client.description:
The bot is missing the following permissions: 
%s.

member.title: Missing permissions
member.description:
You must have following permissions to use the `%s` command: 
%s.
